results.definition: liquid preparation having a soothing or antiseptic or medicinal action when applied to the skin
the act of bringing something to bear; using it for a particular purpose
examples: he advocated the application of statistics to the problem
a novel application of electronics to medical diagnosis
the doctor prescribed a topical application of iodine
a complete bleach requires several applications

results.definition: a program that gives a computer instructions that provide the user with tools to accomplish a task
examples: he has tried several different word processing applications
it is a job requiring serious application

results.definition: a verbal or written request for assistance or employment or admission to a school
examples: December 31 is the deadline for applications

results.definition: the action of putting something into operation
examples: the application of indexes to tables of data
